org.easybatch.xml

Class XmlRecordReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.xml.XmlRecordReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordReader

    public class XmlRecordReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordReader
    A record reader that reads xml records from an xml stream.

    This reader produces XmlRecord instances.

    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)
